honeymoon.name: Honeymoon
honeymoon.description: Enjoy romantic trips designed for newlyweds.

sharm-honeymoon.name: Sharm Honeymoon
sharm-honeymoon.shortDescription: 5 days of romantic luxury in Sharm El Sheikh.
sharm-honeymoon.fullDescription: This package includes luxury accommodation, candle-lit dinners, and beachside activities.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Hotel Check-in
itinerary.description: Arrive in Sharm El Sheikh, enjoy a VIP airport pickup, and settle into your 5-star hotel.

itinerary.title: Snorkeling & Red Sea Relaxation
itinerary.description: Dive into the clear waters of the Red Sea for an unforgettable snorkeling adventure.

itinerary.title: Camel Ride & Desert Sunset
itinerary.description: Take a camel ride through the Sinai desert and watch the magical sunset together.

itinerary.title: Private Boat & Romantic Dinner
itinerary.description: Sail on a private boat tour along the coast, then enjoy a candle-lit dinner by the sea.

itinerary.title: Breakfast & Departure
itinerary.description: Relax with a final breakfast at the hotel before checkout and departure.

luxor-honeymoon.name: Luxor Honeymoon
luxor-honeymoon.fullDescription: Discover temples and enjoy a luxurious cruise.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Check-in
itinerary.description: Arrival in Luxor, check-in to the Nile view hotel, and enjoy a welcome dinner by the Nile.

itinerary.title: East Bank Temples
itinerary.description: Visit Karnak and Luxor Temples with a private guide. Evening horse carriage ride through the city.

itinerary.title: West Bank Exploration
itinerary.description: Explore Valley of the Kings and Hatshepsut Temple, followed by a romantic dinner cruise.

itinerary.title: Museum & Departure
itinerary.description: Visit Luxor Museum and relax before departure.

aswan-honeymoon.name: Aswan Honeymoon
aswan-honeymoon.shortDescription: Experience Nubian charm and Nile sunsets in Aswan.
aswan-honeymoon.fullDescription: Relax by the Nile, explore Philae Temple, and enjoy private moments on felucca rides.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Relaxation
itinerary.description: Arrive in Aswan, transfer to boutique hotel, and relax by the Nile with a sunset view.

itinerary.title: Philae Temple & Felucca Ride
itinerary.description: Visit the majestic Temple of Philae with a private guide, followed by a romantic felucca ride at sunset.

itinerary.title: Nubian Culture & Shopping
itinerary.description: Explore the vibrant Nubian village and shop at the local spice market. End the day with a private dinner by the Nile.

itinerary.title: Leisure & Departure
itinerary.description: Enjoy a relaxed breakfast with Nile views before your departure.

hurghada-honeymoon.name: Hurghada Honeymoon
hurghada-honeymoon.fullDescription: Enjoy pristine beaches, vibrant coral reefs, and luxurious spa experiences.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Beachside Relaxation
itinerary.description: Check in to the beachfront resort and unwind by the Red Sea with a welcome drink.

itinerary.title: Snorkeling & Marine Wonders
itinerary.description: Embark on a snorkeling trip to explore vibrant coral reefs and colorful marine life.

itinerary.title: Glass Boat & Candle-lit Dinner
itinerary.description: Enjoy a glass boat ride over the Red Sea, followed by a romantic candle-lit dinner at the resort.

itinerary.title: Desert Safari & Spa
itinerary.description: Experience an exciting desert safari, then relax with a rejuvenating couple's massage at the spa.

itinerary.title: Farewell Hurghada
itinerary.description: Savor your last seaside breakfast before checkout and departure.

funday.name: Funday
funday.description: Exciting day trips full of activities.

giza-funday.name: Giza Funday
giza-funday.shortDescription: A fun day in Giza with games and food.
giza-funday.fullDescription: Enjoy group games, food and relaxing time.
itinerary: 08:00 AM - Pickup from meeting point in Cairo
09:30 AM - Arrival at Giza fun zone
10:00 AM - Start of group games and team activities
12:30 PM - Lunch break with local Egyptian dishes
02:00 PM - Paintball session and beach games
04:00 PM - Free time for relaxation and photos
05:30 PM - Departure back to Cairo

fayoum-funday.name: Fayoum Funday
fayoum-funday.shortDescription: Adventure and nature escape in Fayoum.
fayoum-funday.fullDescription: Enjoy sandboarding, waterfalls, and a lakeside picnic.
itinerary: 07:00 AM - Departure from Cairo with breakfast on the go
09:30 AM - Arrive in Fayoum and start guided tour
10:00 AM - Sandboarding at the dunes
12:30 PM - Visit Wadi El Rayan waterfalls
01:30 PM - Lakeside picnic lunch and games
03:30 PM - Free time for photos and relaxation
04:30 PM - Start return journey to Cairo

wadi-degla-funday.name: Wadi Degla Funday
wadi-degla-funday.shortDescription: A sporty day of hiking and team games.
wadi-degla-funday.fullDescription: Explore the canyon, play team-building games, and enjoy a BBQ.
itinerary: 08:00 AM - Meet at meeting point and depart to Wadi Degla
09:00 AM - Arrive and start guided hiking trail
11:00 AM - Treasure hunt challenge
12:30 PM - Team-building games and fun competitions
01:30 PM - Enjoy BBQ lunch and refreshments
03:00 PM - Chill time and group photos
04:00 PM - Return to Cairo

cairo-parks-funday.name: Cairo Parks Funday
cairo-parks-funday.shortDescription: Relaxing day in Cairoâ€™s top parks.
cairo-parks-funday.fullDescription: Unwind with nature walks, games, and group activities in Al Azhar Park and family gardens.
itinerary: 08:30 AM - Meet at pickup point and head to Al Azhar Park
09:30 AM - Nature walk and group photo session
11:00 AM - Group games and park activities
12:30 PM - Picnic lunch and relaxation
02:00 PM - Visit family garden for open games
03:30 PM - Free time and chill
04:30 PM - Departure back

family.name: Family
family.description: Perfect vacations for families with kids.

hurghada-family.name: Hurghada Family
hurghada-family.shortDescription: A beach escape with kid-friendly fun.
hurghada-family.fullDescription: Beachside hotel with playgrounds and kids' activities.
itinerary: Day 1 - Arrival in Hurghada, hotel check-in, beach time & dinner
Day 2 - Visit water park in the morning, kids' club activities in the afternoon
Day 3 - Morning at the mini zoo, check-out and return trip

hurghada-family.name: Hurghada Family
hurghada-family.shortDescription: A beach escape with kid-friendly fun.
hurghada-family.fullDescription: Beachside hotel with playgrounds and kids' activities.
itinerary: Day 1 - Arrival in Hurghada, hotel check-in, beach relaxation & dinner
Day 2 - Visit water park in the morning, family games in the afternoon
Day 3 - Mini zoo tour, check-out and return to Cairo

sharm-family.name: Sharm El Sheikh Family
sharm-family.shortDescription: All-inclusive resort for the whole family.
sharm-family.fullDescription: Relax at a family-friendly resort with pools and kids shows.
itinerary: Day 1 - Arrival in Sharm, check-in, pool time & welcome dinner
Day 2 - Morning kids club activities, afternoon snorkeling session
Day 3 - Relax at resort, optional family tour, evening entertainment show
Day 4 - Breakfast, check-out and travel back

alex-family.name: Alexandria Family Weekend
alex-family.shortDescription: Cultural and beach fun for families.
alex-family.fullDescription: Visit museums, play on the beach, and enjoy seafood by the sea.
itinerary: Day 1 - Arrive in Alexandria, visit aquarium & enjoy seafood dinner
Day 2 - Morning beach games, museum tour, family boat ride, return home

fayoum-family.name: Fayoum Nature Family Trip
fayoum-family.fullDescription: Stay in a camp with family activities and star gazing.
itinerary: Day 1 - Arrival and camp check-in, afternoon safari, evening campfire games
Day 2 - Morning nature walk, star watching activity, return after lunch

cairo-luxury.name: Cairo Luxury
cairo-luxury.fullDescription: 5-star suite, private guide, fine dining and spa.
itinerary: Day 1 - VIP airport pickup, check-in at 5-star suite, welcome dinner
Day 2 - Private museum tours, fine dining lunch, spa session
Day 3 - Helicopter tour over Cairo, yacht sunset cruise
Day 4 - Shopping at luxury boutiques, chauffeur to airport

luxor-luxury.name: Luxor Royal Retreat
luxor-luxury.shortDescription: Discover ancient wonders in first-class luxury.
luxor-luxury.fullDescription: Enjoy a private Nile cruise, guided historical tours, and royal treatment.
itinerary: Day 1 - Arrival in Luxor, check-in to 5-star Nile cruise, welcome gourmet dinner
Day 2 - Hot air balloon ride, private guided tour to Karnak & Luxor Temples, spa evening
Day 3 - Sunset felucca cruise, after-hours temple access, farewell dinner

aswan-luxury.name: Aswan Elegance
aswan-luxury.fullDescription: Luxury stay with private felucca ride, Nubian culture, and fine cuisine.
itinerary: Day 1 - Arrival in Aswan, resort check-in, sunset spa session
Day 2 - Visit Nubian village with cultural guide, private felucca ride on the Nile
Day 3 - Morning yoga, relaxing breakfast, dinner cruise before departure

sharm-luxury.name: Sharm El Sheikh Deluxe
sharm-luxury.fullDescription: Indulge in sea view suites, private beach, diving, and spa.
itinerary: Day 1 - Arrival and check-in, sunset beachside dinner
Day 2 - Scuba diving session with instructor, relaxing spa
Day 3 - Private yacht cruise and underwater photography
Day 4 - Leisure day on private beach, optional butler-led excursion
Day 5 - Breakfast with sea view, checkout and farewell
